meanings.definition: A carving or inscription on a rock surface, typically prehistoric.
meanings.sent1: The ancient petroglyph depicted a hunting scene.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the intricate petroglyphs on the canyon walls.
meanings.sent3: The petroglyph seemed to wink at the tourists passing by.
meanings.sent4: The petroglyphs told stories of the past in silent stone language.
meanings.sent5: The petroglyph stood as a timeless record of ancient artistry.

meanings.definition: To carve or inscribe on a rock surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully petroglyphed the symbols onto the boulder.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists petroglyphed the historical events onto the cave walls.
meanings.sent3: She playfully petroglyphed her initials into the soft clay.
meanings.sent4: His words petroglyphed a lasting memory in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor petroglyphed his emotions into the stone masterpiece.
